name: Proto de Slurpcanon
description:
Merci de tester mon proto !

C'est un tout premier test pour avoir des feedbacks le plus vite possible, si tu as le temps et l'envie, ce serait cool que tu remplisse ce questionnaire après avoir testé le jeu :)

QUESTIONNAIRE : https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1u_0821vO-W7vnicA2B4l7s8q4vDl3AwaZVjccu_kazM/edi...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you're not French and found this game by chance well...hello !

I'm a French solo gamedev working on a puzzle game with no name (for now) and it's a first early prototype to test the very basics of the game.

I make 1 devlog a month about the game but it's French :° You can still check my Twitter though if you are interested (link below). Thanks :D

SOCIALS :

Twitter :https://twitter.com/Slurpcanon

Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU8W1vq77J7XCr7KETyZxSQ
